EmailTemplate.description: Notify licensee their Credential was successfully Issued
EmailTemplate.name: Credential Confirmation Email for MNF
EmailTemplate.subject: Credential Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This message is auto-generated by the eSLA
*Please do not reply to this email*
{!Today()}
Dear {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Primary_Licensee__c},
Credential number {!MUSW__License2__c.Name} has been successfully issued and is valid through {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Expiration_Date__c}.
If you have any questions please contact the agency during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dspssbmanfhomes@wisconsin.gov.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
